maintext.text:
Commander,
I am receiving an incoming communication from Deep 6.
Dr. Muller would like to talk to you.

With your permission I would transfer the call directly to your communicator.

rightButton.rbText:
Not now.
I need to take care of something.

maintext.text:
Commander,
Dr. Muller seemed nervous and agitated.
You would be well advised to speak to her immediately.

I am transferring the communication.

rightButton.rbText: I've told you I don't have time ri...

maintext.text:
Commander,
Robin speaking.

Can you hear me?

I've been waiting for quite a while.

Finally I've reached you!
Great to have you back.

I hope you've enjoyed your vacation! The last few weeks weren't easy without you.

Some very strange things have been happening around here...

rightButton.rbText:
Well,
you're working on Deep 6 now, you should be used to that by now.

maintext.text:
I don't even know where to begin...

Though there's one thing you should know right away.

Professor Orlow has been acting very weird lately...

Do you remember our last expedition?

We were collecting samples and brought them back to the station.

How can you forget that?

We even wrote a report and sent it to mission control.

leftButton.lbText:
[lie]
Ah, of course.
The report...
I remember now.

rightButton.rbText: It must have disappeared in the pile on my desk.

maintext.text:
I am absolutely certain that I've archived the samples in the laboratory after we examined them.
A few days ago I wanted to run some more tests, but they were gone. Besides me and Professor Orlow there's no one on this station, so he must have taken them.

leftButton.lbText: Did you ask him about that?

rightButton.rbText: Why would the Professor take the samples?

maintext.text:
He denied everything and claims he doesn't know anything about that.

But then he accused me of having lost the samples.
He said I was too inexpierienced, "wet behind the ears".

Can you believe that?

leftButton.lbText: Wow, that was very unfair of him.

rightButton.rbText:
Oh well,
you do tend to be a little disorganized..

maintext.text:
Frankly, the results we've gotten so far from these samples are surpassing anything we could've hoped for.
What should we do?

Prepare for a second expedition and collect new samples?

leftButton.lbText: Start preparations for another expedition, we need these samples.

rightButton.rbText: Another mission is too much of a risk, we need to figure out what's happening here first.

maintext.text: I can tell you what's happening: The good Professor lost the samples because he's not the youngest anymore. He's probably discarded them with all the excess debris and is now blaming me.

leftButton.lbText:
Be that as it may.
We still need to prepare for another excursion.

rightButton.rbText:
I'll talk to the Professor later.
But please start preparations for another mission anyway.

maintext.text:
Are you sure?

Our instruments are picking up more and more strange activity out there.
Visibility has also worsened considerably.

It's almost like a sub-aquatic storm.

rightButton.rbText: That doesn't sound good. Do you have more data for us to analyse?

maintext.text:
Hold on!

I think I've heard something.
...
...
...
Hmm, for a moment I thought the Professor was standing by my door eavesdropping.

leftButton.lbText: Well now I'm starting to worry!

maintext.text:
Hm, maybe I should focus more on my work.
Even though I've been feeling... strange lately...

Anyway.
I'll get in touch with you later if there's something new to report.

Over and Out.

leftButton.lbText:
Alright.
Talk to you later.

Over and Out.

rightButton.rbText:
Don't do anything stupid!

Over and Out.

maintext.text:
Commander,
I am detecting increased stress levels in Dr. Muller.
If her condition does not improve in the next hours, I recommend taking the appropriate steps.

rightButton.rbText:
Out of the question!
She's just a little irritated because she's lost the samples.
It'll be fine.

maintext.text:
Do not delay your decision too much.

Occurrences of this kind are a danger to the success of the mission and cannot be tolerated.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

leftButton.lbText:
No, thank you.
Just give me some time to think about it.

rightButton.rbText:
Yes,
get in touch with Professor Orlow.
I want to talk to him.

maintext.text:
My records of the last hours do not indicate that Dr. Muller is responsible for the disappearance of the samples.

You may want to talk to Professor Orlow to clarify the situation.

leftButton.lbText:
Nonsense,
I'm sure Robin lost the samples.

rightButton.rbText:
Yes,
get in touch with Professor Orlow.
I want to talk to him.

maintext.text:
Yes, Commander.

I will contact you at a later time.
***offline***

Commander,

the crew is currently busy.

I will contact you as soon as there are any new developments.
